creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: framed; confused looking male figure in Western clothing seated on stool with legs spread wide apart, scratching his head; small round table with food in front; man is holding out a glass goblet which a smaller man standing on a chair is filling from a pitcher; taller man at R with hair in long queue in robe and wide-legged pants is offering the seated man a hat; at LR, a small woman is nursing a small male figure
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Print (ukiyo-e)
